item.title: 令人惊讶的客人在白俄罗斯 - 俄罗斯战争游戏中：两位美国观察家 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 令人惊讶的客人在白俄罗斯战争游戏中令人惊讶href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte9mwdbnvglzd2rzunlzvwvrntaywugz CMDFV0NSATL4EL9YDVHSNJNDWVJHQ3NBU01IMDRBTMQTBHBHB3ULJKZS16MHPIR3FWQ0F6RHXMXMXUZMFAXUQ？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>白俄罗斯和俄罗斯的火力表演似乎是给欧洲的信息＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 莫斯科和明斯克的排练在白俄罗斯部署的核武器推出，卢卡申科说＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> reuters href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxpazqyykh4uvrjxy1ey0e5umk4t1voeudfwk1udfwk1utfwk1utzrqawd4z1nznznznnzannzan1dzbhe4ov uyx0hpowy0szbqmvhpy0d6wehielb1aw10wgfon3flx0xodhjmqxpxpxudfqy3gzymvetdbxvdirvffffffffffffffffffffffffffffbtadzicju4b3jrtzjrtzjtel9jtel9tel9vsvsvsvsvsvsvsvsvsvsvqzmtbgmq？oc = 5' Target =“ _ Blank”>美国观察白俄罗斯战争游戏，因为北约盟友感到莫斯科入侵的热量 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitgfbvv95cuxntljxcuiyqndhzdrscnbdrscnbdrfpxumr2zg1wbicwbicwbicwbicwbicwt0pqn0pqn053t21d1d1dvvno1dvno1elzfudhzfudhzfudhmmbimm gnmmmbimmm f.fudhmmmb.sbr.clmmb.immbr.imm zbr.imb. wt0hnvzlatglkme1ooflttttdzbnpcyll0zwpxvmj3dwr5q3bebhzgd2vwnwt3sjkzc2sx wl9aawvuwmh6v2zhylrquzdyu0fcqlvgwfp6ufv5vv9lyum4mjz3ckfwmjuzy01adfnob 29ySmVVQTVrUE1Sd9IBuwFBVV95cUxNSUR1OTQyS3YzM2VpS1o5SG0zc3BGY0lCMHZNNkNDczRSZGxidUtiQ21ucHVULS1IaFh0SUtfSDV6WmlJT2VYeW9EZDlYMG9GTWFpcUl0elR wczf0x3drdunvm003yu9iotnnnc2nnzkv2lxp1nfplnhzmamtmltntalpla2van3f3azu4 BWDWTS1PTTV1TJZ0MFC0QNK5ZFFQZ2PQYJJJJJJJJJ2UTRZUHKZZXBKRKRKTKCME2Z0ZWDUXF？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯在Zapad 2025使用白俄罗斯＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera

item.title: 研究人员说，在亚洲发现的烟熏人遗骸可能是世界上最古老的木乃伊 - CBS新闻
item.description: ＆nbsp; nbsp; cbs news cbs news> href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmigafbvv95cuxqbja1ogproutqoulydkhpb0c4strnvxdva2t1vdroww5lylrjs01quj Zrs2cteglwd2tkova0t1Q3S2DSALVNOEGZRZBRS0XSQMZXBVA4ADLKOGTSAJQ4LU1FTZJZJZJZSVZSVZSVZVZVEVHJCMNWCMNWCZAXKAXSSSSSSSLXSSLRIRIRRIRV9CSEHSNF9TRG？ target =“ _ blank”>在亚洲发现的最古老的人类木乃伊化证据，科学家说＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 科学家说他们已经找到了世界上最古老的木乃伊，而且它们远非埃及＆nbsp; nbsp; nbc news 世界上最古老的木乃伊在10，000年前在中国和东南亚被烟熏干燥，研究人员发现＆nbsp; nbsp; 发现了最古老的人木乃伊，它们不是我们期望的＆nbsp; nbsp; yahoo.com

item.description: 美国法官不会干预特朗普政府对西非人的驱逐出境， href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiiafbvv95cuxon2xum2xum2vvrgd2txkwbdvkcjrudk9dwdddnbwnfdwr3s2ninflboboedpb0ztsmv UQUPFEETJUZHPBTR2TDJLYW55BGTJZEZOCKNMS1PSMGGWUC1MAVV2VMNPMEVMEVNVDZFNLROEVL4AFEZT3NCZ1CXV3ZDRVPZRVPZRVPZR213YTF5MVPZR213YTF5MVERTF5MVERTF5MVRETJQWVTQT？ target =“ _ blank”>联邦法官拒绝干预被驱逐到加纳的移民＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinAFBVV95cUxQYUVrODNvVFVkM1JEc3Axd3VqLXpKam4xUjNfb0xNV3Y5VmFiX3VZQUw1MUMtaGhXOHdwVnhUQ 19xTEFiWTA2a1BUaTZiVXNsVzZZS1JKVGIyb3B5SWZoZUdzekJlSEFPUTRFYzFjOHlXcFBrWW02d2VQeVE4Z0dwRUd3VmxQbWRBWFdFTzg4ZGVMWWRQRjduUS1IWUE?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>法官说，尽管酷刑恐惧＆nbsp; politico 被驱逐到加纳的移民被送回家，律师说有些人可能会面临酷刑＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> cnn 更多的非洲国家正在接受美国驱逐出境的第三国移民，这里有5件事＆nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f”

item.description: 无人机中和在华沙的政府建筑物上飞行，唐纳德·图斯克（PM Donald Tusk）说 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirgFBVV95cUxOX24ya2k2Y2FKTFA5WTJLOUtGNEF0ZHVGN0xIRWdQT3c1eGc0a1pMbHUtLWFDZXVMbGtibFpia2hCUDJFZTBFe ly5d25gthgzzhbqymnzuwlzmzhovnbxzlbsqtfgs1brm2hwuknvq2eymmtsltdnc0xdbefhu k96Bezzym1jn1dbny00ujuzbjbjbjbjb0vhznmdn0rfvneghib0fgrvbxdxn3ttlwseniwxc？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>“战室新闻通讯：为什么俄罗斯真正将无人机送入波兰＆nbsp; nbsp; 经济学家 被指控犯有无人驾驶飞机飞越波兰总统宫殿的嫌疑人是白俄罗斯和乌克兰人 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikwFBVV95cUxNdld2YkUybU81M0FPVl9YS0xmQ3UyZ05MeElQYmN0S253b0pjTzZsN2RaQ0Zfc3FnaDZ hr0rhamzgnhn5zhzrvudysghszvlbmghxcnpom0n6wffpu0tiumd3ynrunzlxn25vzwj2z1e1nwtwx01begtiqwm1begtiqwm1stdguewtguewtuelhrvmjgnzvmjgnzv3uzv3uzv3Uzzv3Uzzts19Legmmmgmmgmm = 5' target =“ _ blank”>北约应在乌克兰施加无灯区域以防止俄罗斯无人机，波兰说＆nbsp; cnn> cnn <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqwFBVV95cUxOZFdNamc0QkJFVExsVGw5dlEyMDgxVFJxcU91QUt6OS10bHpKLWR1d3VxRlRRME1ZZGk1Q3IzNFlLc0ZGNHN nmepadurwugwybnb6sxlrlxhanm13tnnsqzruqwhecmw2nhnhhnhhnhhnhhnhhn3zjbtsc1fu3dquhrrrakprdx KXTZNEBJETVXZTDZFUU0TOTOZMLMCWTYA21ISLZKD3PLRMY5Z1PZA2RPLTVAUHP3WGM？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>北约在第一个东方哨兵响应中争夺喷气式飞机，以捍卫联盟＆nbsp; nbsp; shape.nato.into.int.int

item.title: 随着中国影响力的增长，澳大利亚和巴布亚新几内亚签署国防协定 - 美联社新闻
item.description: 澳大利亚和巴布亚新几内亚签署国防条约，因为中国的影响力增长＆nbsp; ap News png庆祝独立性，与澳大利亚签署国防条约＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiuAFBVV95cUxNUFhocU5rajRKNWY4eEV6NnNkaTE3Q29RT0lBRTFMZGVhLWxWNlZZbVczODUxT2ZWckxueC1YMmRUTzZzd3oxaUZYcXB QeflztKnervJurzd4T2TOOEM0M0XHRKRQBXA1AGXRTWHEUVJVQTVWWLTJRQ2M4QNJXU29BQMHRRW XXYLZJMKTHNVL0AZZLSJJJJJJJJJJWFVGOXLPWD0BENZRJHUQUTAD1ZXMXMXLWC0FUYM444UDF3？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>澳大利亚PM Albanese在国防条约签署之前到达PNG ＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 澳大利亚和PNG将同意互相防御军事攻击，因为中国的太平洋影响力增长＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirwfbvv95cuxptlc5vwrtyzjcwkzmelzmelzbrjmpprjmppprjmppprjmpprjmppprjmtylzdxzdxx3n3n3n3vetcn2k3uupbvrmkmkbmkbrhmkhmkhmkhhylmkhhylmkhhylmkhhylmkhhylmkhhylmkn42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42n42 dzlbvhrd3dkrwmzrkpgsgsgjtczr2c0zmz2tia0syn2fkuuxpx2hrtlrywk55a3dlywpgae9py znkdlfltmpxzc1jmtrpoxdstdvqqwtewe5achhwbwzlbejewghnvjdmwgzlwmvpam13？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>'战斗就绪'：澳大利亚和PNG将有义务在条约下互相辩护＆nbsp; nbsp; 澳大利亚广播公司

item.title: 土耳其：成千上万的抗议反对派的抗议-DW.com
item.description: 土耳其：成千上万的抗议反对反对派＆nbsp; nbsp; dw.com turkiye法院休会案件，挑战卫生防护局反对党的国会＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera
